itemLabel: Richard Nugent, Baron Nugent of Guildford

wikipedia_page.main: George Richard Hodges Nugent, Baron Nugent of Guildford,  (6 June 1907 – 16 March 1994), known as Sir Richard Nugent, 1st Baronet between 1960 and 1966, was a British Conservative politician.
